Bash(git tag -a v1.5.0 -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
WeedDB v1.5.0 - Documentation & Onboarding Overhaul

This release makes WeedDB accessible to absolute beginners and provides 
comprehensive Obsidian customization options.

Key Features:
- Complete beginner setup guides for all operating systems
- Obsidian themes & customization guide  
- YAML frontmatter metadata system for all documentation
- Documentation maintenance guidelines
- WeedDB logo integration across all docs

Quality: 100% documentation coverage, 0 broken links, all files on v1.5.0

See CHANGELOG.md for full details.
EOF
)")
